comments:
Return binary content of a CONNECT request.

>>> from scrapy.utils.python import to_unicode as s >>> s(tunnel_request_data("example.com", 8080)) 'CONNECT example.com:8080 HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com:8080

' >>> s(tunnel_request_data("example.com", 8080, b"123")) 'CONNECT example.com:8080 HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com:8080
Proxy-Authorization: 123

' >>> s(tunnel_request_data(b"example.com", "8090")) 'CONNECT example.com:8090 HTTP/1.1
Host: example.com:8090

'
